actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to recognize the time required to save funds for the college education of adopted children.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to set forth a formula to adjust the amount of required family contribution for parents of dependent children in cases where such children are adopted.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to recognize the time required to save funds for the college education of adopted children.
